title: Asian Stocks Gain After Trump Touts Greenland Deal: Markets Wrap
description: Asian stocks followed Wall Street higher after US President Donald Trump’s comments about a “framework” deal with NATO over Greenland eased concerns that had fueled market volatility. Gold and silver fell.
content: Asian stocks followed Wall Street higher after US President Donald Trump’s comments about a “framework” deal with NATO over Greenland eased concerns that had fueled market volatility. Gold and silver fell.
